sentence.Network_en: I discovered an addiction to housework which I had never felt before.
sentence.Network_cn: 我发现自己迷上了做家务，之前我从没有这种感觉。

sentence.Network_en: You can really work up a sweat doing housework.
sentence.Network_cn: 做家务真的会让人大汗淋漓。

sentence.Network_en: I just feel women are conditioned into doing housework.
sentence.Network_cn: 我只是觉得女性做家务是习惯使然。

entry.def: Housework is the work such as cleaning, washing, and ironing that you do in your home.

means.word_mean: 1. the work of cleaning and running a house
